name: Dash Masters(Experigame)
description:
Dash Masters is a local competitive game where players control a disc that can dash through rivals' discs and crash them!!!
This is an experigame. What is an experigame? They are very small projects that I made to test some ideas, technologies or to check my abilities 

RULES

To win you should be the last disc standing. You can destroy other players by dashing over them. You only can das when any of your dash bars are full, bars are filled over time. 

Each disc has three lives, every time you die your disc gains a new dash bar. So each time you die you can perform more consecutive dashes (if more of one bar is full).

One dashing disc cannot be destroyed, two dashing discs will be repelled.

CONTROLS 

Move the disc: 

  • Keyboard: WASD
  • Gamepad (recommended): Left stick.

Dash:

  • Keyboard: Space bar
  • Gamepad (recommended): A (Xbox layout) / X(Playstation layout)
